Class HashtableCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.cache.HashtableCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache

    public class HashtableCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cache
    A lightweight implementation of the Cache interface
    Author:
    Gavin King
